name: Divide & Conquer
description: You're a walking number and you need to survive. The other numbers will try to make you less than 1. Throw "power downs" at them and collect "power ups" to make yourself bigger. Complete objectives to unlock new levels and worlds.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel or AMD Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space
